Subject: Vulnerability found during scanning
Description: Good afternoon. Our vulnerability scanner reported the following medium-level vulnerability on our EPP instance: Multiple Mail Server EXPN/VRFY Information Disclosure "If you are using Sendmail, add the option : O PrivacyOptions=goaway in /etc/sendmail.cf." Is this something that can be remediated? It may also be related to our other open ticket regarding mail notifications: 00434127 Please advise. Thank you.
Solution_Comment__c: Customer reran scan and found that issue has cleared. Customer requested to close the case.
